document.full_text: the california man who abducted 11-year-old jaycee lee dugard in 1991 and held her captive for 18 years was sentenced on thursday to life in prison.
document.title: jaycee dugard kidnapper gets life in prison
lines_and_colors: the california man who abducted 11-year-old jaycee lee dugard in 1991 and held her captive for 18 years was sentenced on thursday to life in prison.
